group_1.narration: I came to know the cruel fate of@Magical Girls turning into Witches...
I also learned that what I had previously@seen was called a Doppel.
It was a system created by the Magius to@prevent Magical Girls from becoming Witches.
For the purpose of "liberating Magical Girls,"
an organization called the Wings of the Magius was formed.
That's why I decided to join them.
To achieve "the liberation of Magical Girls"...
Although Nanami-san and the others criticized me@for joining the Wings of the Magius,
it was all to save the people I had led towards@the horrible fate awaiting Magical Girls.
Even though I hadn't known the fate of@Magical Girls at the time,
I bore responsibility to those I had guided@into becoming Magical Girls.
Saving both Magical Girls and non-magical people...@I believed that I could find a way without sacrifices.
That was the mission I found.
